meta.title: Sail Liao | Front-end Engineer Resume
meta.description: Front-end engineer resume: Next.js, React, Vue, TypeScript, Tailwind, and admin console experience.

hero.ledeHtml: Front-end engineer building dashboards, desktop tools, and browser extensions with Next.js, React, Vue, and TypeScript. Enjoys UI implementation, state management, mock APIs, and tight collaboration with backend teams.

skills.title: Core Skills
skills.desc: Build maintainable front-end architecture and ship interfaces quickly with aligned APIs.

experience.title: Experience
experience.desc: Led or contributed to admin consoles, internal systems, desktop tools, and browser extensions.

items.listHtml:
• Built a HyperLedger blockchain admin console with Next.js App Router; accelerated UI delivery via Tailwind CSS + Figma Claude MCP.
  • Created MSW mock APIs and aligned contracts with backend through Swagger UI to reduce integration risk.
  • Developed internal personnel/case management with Vue.js, Pinia, Postman mock api for synchronized status tracking.
  • Delivered internal tools with jQuery, Electron to speed evidence workflows.

• Shipped an e-commerce site in 4 weeks using React + styled-components with carousel, cart, and infinite scroll.
  • Built a Chrome Extension in 5 weeks with TypeScript + Zustand + Tailwind for typed stateful UI.
  • Guided teammates to adopt Tailwind and co-delivered new commerce features with iOS/backend in one week.

• Maintained and updated app content for textbook releases; coordinated authors and reviewers to meet deadlines.
  • Managed the YouTube channel for senior high/vocational materials, handling uploads and homepage curation.

items.desc: Helped students solve English questions and provided feedback on essays.

projects.title: Projects
projects.desc: Personal and commercial-facing builds focused on data flow, interactions, and deployment.

items.title: Tabsence · Chrome Extension
items.desc: Browser extension for tab management with pinning, sorting, spaces, and usage tracking. Uses chrome.tabs API and lightweight state for sync.

items.title: STYLiSH · E-commerce
items.desc: Built a website based on Figma design with React + styled-components; implemented carousel, infinite scroll, and cart; deployed on Firebase Hosting.
items.chip: React · styled-components · React Router · Firebase Hosting

education.title: Education & More
education.desc: Strong language background; quick to learn new tech and communicate across teams.

items.title: National Taiwan University · Foreign Languages & Literature
items.desc: B.A. focused on linguistics and cross-cultural communication.

items.label: Language Proficiency
items.title: English TOEIC 985 · Mandarin, Taiwanese
items.desc: Fluent in reading/writing/speaking; comfortable drafting technical and product docs.

footer.roleValue: Front-end Engineer / Software Engineer · Taipei / New Taipei / Remote
